about_the_game:
TheLastDrive:2335


Step into a world shrouded in mystery and desolation in "The Last Drive 2335," a spine-chilling terror game that takes you on a haunting journey through a post-apocalyptic landscape. With its nostalgic PSX-styled graphics, immerse yourself in an atmospheric experience reminiscent of classic survival horror titles.

In the year 2335, following a series of calamities, the world has become a hell for mankind. "The Last Drive" places the player in a devastated land known as the Veiled Grove. It is the player's task to survive and find a new home after being kicked out of his shelter, while driving and exploring shrouded by fog and the ruins of society.

Armed only with your trusty vehicle and dwindling supplies, you must navigate treacherous terrain, confront lurking dangers, and adapt to what will now be your new habitat: a broken land filled with horrors, dark secrets and no signs of helpful life.

Along the way, the player will face monstrous creatures, meet various characters through their radio while driving, and search for a purpose for their new life.

Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative of solitude, desperation, and the quest for a new home in a dying world, where every decision could mean the difference between salvation and annihilation. Can you brave the horrors of the wasteland and discover the truth that lies beyond the horizon?

Key features


    [- Explore a vast and atmospheric world rendered in haunting PSX-style graphics.- Navigate perilous environments filled with hidden dangers and ominous secrets.- Engage in tense and immersive driving mechanics as you traverse the desolate landscape.- Uncover the truth behind the cataclysmic event that brought humanity to its knees.- Confront the terrifying horrors that hide in the Veiled Grove.- Take important decisions that will impact the outcome of the narrative. - Experience a gripping narrative of solitude, desperation, and the quest for a new home in a dying world.]

content_descriptors.notes: In The Last Drive, there will be psychological terror as well as living horrors that can haunt the character, and also thrilling combat. Occasionally some corpse or indicators of dead humans, all in PSX-styled graphics.

pegi.descriptors: This game has been rated PEGI 16 due to intense horror elements and mature themes. Players will encounter disturbing scenes with a dark and claustrophobic atmosphere typical of retro horror. The narrative includes references to violence, extreme danger, and dialogue that addresses mature topics such as fear, despair, and loss. The language may be strong, and certain scenes may suggest violence or psychological distress, making it suitable for audiences aged 16 and over.
